title: [News] Chad Muska Celebrates Big Win as Lorain Skatepark Budget Approved After Years of Effort
description:
Skateboarding legend Chad Muska has been putting in work for years to get a proper skatepark built in Lorain Ohio and last night everything finally came together.

As we previously reported, Muska ret...

de.title: [News] Chad Muska Celebrates Big Win as Lorain Skatepark Budget Approved After Years of Effort
de.content:
Skateboarding legend Chad Muska has been putting in work for years to get a proper skatepark built in Lorain Ohio and last night everything finally came together.

As we previously reported, Muska returned to Lorain and has been planning to build the city’s biggest skatepark.

After years of planning and waiting, the city gave the green light and the budget for the skatepark was officially approved.

Muska pulled up to the City Hall meeting not knowing the decision was happening that night.

It ... (Originalquelle: Shredder News)

title: [News] Brandon Turner Issues Powerful Message on Mental Health and Alcohol Abuse, “You Are Not Alone”
description:
Pro skater and recovery advocate Brandon Turner is speaking from the heart about something that does not get talked about enough in skateboarding.

Over the years, parts of the skate world have been c...

de.title: [News] Brandon Turner Issues Powerful Message on Mental Health and Alcohol Abuse, “You Are Not Alone”
de.content:
Pro skater and recovery advocate Brandon Turner is speaking from the heart about something that does not get talked about enough in skateboarding.

Over the years, parts of the skate world have been closely tied to partying, drinking, and drug use.

For some, it was just part of the culture. For others, it became something much heavier.

There have been real struggles behind the scenes, and in some tragic cases, lives have been lost to addiction and suicide.

It is a side of the industry that ma... (Originalquelle: Shredder News)

title: [News] TJ Rogers Gets Special Edition Bronzed Pro Shoe for Lifelong Loyalty to Core Brand éS
description:
éS Skateboarding got some of TJ Rogers’ closest friends together to celebrate a big moment in his career

They hooked him up with a special bronzed version of his pro shoe to honor decades of dedicati...

de.title: [News] TJ Rogers Gets Special Edition Bronzed Pro Shoe for Lifelong Loyalty to Core Brand éS
de.content:
éS Skateboarding got some of TJ Rogers’ closest friends together to celebrate a big moment in his career

They hooked him up with a special bronzed version of his pro shoe to honor decades of dedication and love for skateboarding.

TJ has been grinding in the scene for years and it shows. Few skaters show the kind of passion and care he puts into everything he does. The bronzed shoe celebrates that commitment and locks in his spot in the éS Footwear Hall of Fame.

Don Brown from éS said congratu... (Originalquelle: Shredder News)

description:

After his legal troubles, which ended with an acquittal for the murder of...

de.title: [News] Terry Kennedy Back on Board and Still Got Mad Steeze with Switch God Stance
de.content:
Professional skateboarder Terry Kennedy is back on the streets and showing everyone that he still got that mad steezy in him.

After his legal troubles, which ended with an acquittal for the murder of fellow skater Josiah Kassahun but a conviction for battery, TK is stepping back into the skate scene with a new chapter in his life.

He’s launched his own skateboard brand, TK Skate Co, and it looks like he’s ready to let everyone know why he’s such a standout skater.

His latest clips on Instagra... (Originalquelle: Shredder News)

title: [News] Skateshop Day x Image Comics x Deluxe Exclusive Collection Available Only at Core Doors
description:

title: [News] OG Pro Skater Gershon Mosley Says “Black Is a Caste Status” ‘Imposed’ by “Bigoted Immigrants”
description:
OG pro skater Gershon Mosley is catching heavy criticism after posting a lengthy and confrontational statement about race and identity on social media.

In the post, Mosley claimed that “Black” is a c...

de.title: [News] OG Pro Skater Gershon Mosley Says “Black Is a Caste Status” ‘Imposed’ by “Bigoted Immigrants”
de.content:
OG pro skater Gershon Mosley is catching heavy criticism after posting a lengthy and confrontational statement about race and identity on social media.

In the post, Mosley claimed that “Black” is a caste status that bigoted immigrants imposed on youth through schools.

He also referenced American Indian legal definition legacies and suggested that people who label him Black are either ignorant of their own ancestry or foreigners or government employees.

He ended the message with a blunt line s... (Originalquelle: Shredder News)

de.content:
Bekannter LA Courthouse Skateboard Spot gerettet

11. Februar 2026  
			08:26  -  Johannes Gausepohl

Viele dürften den Skateboard Spot in Los Angeles, das Gerichtsgebäude in West LA, aus zahlreichen Videos kennen. Der Spot stand vor dem Abriss aber wieder konnte man den Spot retten!

de.title: ENJOI – Press Release
de.content:
ENJOI – Press Release

Große News erreichen uns von dem totgelaubten Brand ENJOI am heutigen Valentinstag. Nein, es hat rein garnichts mit deiner Freundin, deinem Freund, deiner Sekretärin oder der Affäre deiner Frau zu tun – zum Glück mag man denken.

Nachdem vier Jahre vergangen sind und das ganze Team am 14.2.2022 quittete, verkündete das Aushängeschild Louie Barletta, dass ENJOI nun wieder in den Händen ist, wohin der Brand gehört und zwar zu Louie. Dabei wird sichergestellt, dass der Brand ... (Originalquelle: Limited Skateboarding)
